• Woman may not be able to follow medical advice, such as adhering to HIV treatment.
• Woman may pr esent with repeated STIs; unexplained chronic pain or conditions; repeated health

• Woman may miss follow-up appointments (there might be many reasons for this)
• Woman may have thoughts, plans or acts of self-harm or attempted suicide.
